title: League doesn't want me to exit?
body: I was getting ready to go to bed and I clicked the X button in the top right corner and it popped up a message that said "if you exit the game now, you'll reieve a time penalty that will either stop you or your team from entering a matchmade game! If you are in  a League series, dodging will end your series if this is the determining loss. Are you sure you want to leave?" why does it say that?

replies.body: Not sure if troll post.. You cant just leave a game halfway though.
it was not in game it was in the client
I have seen that happen when the game crashes or closes in an unusual fashion and the client gets confused.

this was not in game
i was done playing and tried to close the client
It must have thought a match was still in session. Don't worry about it, I'm pretty sure AFK tracking is on the server side, so you got an empty warning message.
I have done it several times and my status does not think i am in game
